item.title: Erik Menendez denied parole after decades in prison
item.description: California officials have denied Erik Menendez parole after he spent decades in prison for killing his parents in 1989.

item.title: 6 found dead during confined space rescue at Northern Colorado dairy farm
item.description: Six people were found dead Wednesday evening at a dairy farm in Northern Colorado, officials said.
